|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== IAP-225 ''w/ integral antennas''
This FCC ID applies to the APIN0224 (removable antennas) :and the APIN0225 (integral antennas).
"[G]48RNAW04.SGD" and "PCB P/N: 2010169D REV: 01" is silkscreened on the main board ([[Wistron NeWeb]]). "(C)2012 ARUBA NETWORKS" and "PCB P/N: 201017G REV: B" is silkscreened on the top of the blue wireless module. "[G]48DNXB0E.SGB" is silkscreened on the bottom. {{see also|Aerohive AP230|Motorola Solutions AP 7532}} What are the Processor and RAM configuration for below IAP's :The SoC and RAM is shielded in the FCC photos. {{WiFiCert|WFA19427|07/18/2013}}
==See also== ===Models=== [http://community.arubanetworks.com/t5/Controllerless-Networks/IAP-225-amp-IAP-325-Processors/td-p/259382 On '''community.arubanetworks.com'''] ([http://community.arubanetworks.com/t5/What-s-in-the-Box/tkb-p/WhatsintheBox images]) *[[Aruba Networks APIN0205]] (IAP-205) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q9DAPIN0204205 Q9DAPIN0204205] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM53014, Flash: 32MB, RAM: 128MB *[[Aruba Networks APIN0215]] (IAP-215) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q9DAPIN0214215 Q9DAPIN0214215] :CPU: [[Freescale]] P1010, Flash: 32MB, RAM: 256MB *[[Aruba Networks APIN0225]] (IAP-225) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q9DAPIN0224225 Q9DAPIN0224225] :CPU: [[Freescale]] P1020, Flash: 32MB, RAM: 512MB
*[[Aruba Networks APIN0305]] (IAP-305) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q9DAPIN0304305 Q9DAPIN0304305] *[[Aruba Networks APIN0315]] (IAP-315) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q9DAPIN0314315 Q9DAPIN0314315] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064, Flash: 128MB, RAM: 128MB, BT: [[TI]] CC2540 *[[Aruba Networks APIN0325]] (IAP-325) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q9DAPIN0324325 Q9DAPIN0324325] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064, Flash: 128MB, RAM: 256MB *[[Aruba Networks APIN0335]] (IAP-335) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q9DAPIN0334335 Q9DAPIN0334335] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064, Flash: 128MB, RAM: 512MB *[[Aruba Networks APEX0365]] (EAP-365) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q9DAPEX0365367 Q9DAPEX0365367] :EX - external, IN - internal, H - hospitality
